markdownRemark.html: I’ve just obtained the spatialparalysis.xyz domain. I’m going to move blog here from my old blog/portfolio website (nearimprov.com). I wanted to try out Gatsby JS, so that I could build some little React components in various places. I’ve used React a lot over the last two years.
